speaker: SICINIUS
text_entry: SCENE VII. A camp, at a small distance from Rome.

speaker: SICINIUS
text_entry: Enter AUFIDIUS and his Lieutenant

speaker: AUFIDIUS
text_entry: Do they still fly to the Roman?

speaker: Lieutenant
text_entry: I do not know what witchcraft's in him, but

speaker: Lieutenant
text_entry: Your soldiers use him as the grace 'fore meat,

speaker: Lieutenant
text_entry: Their talk at table, and their thanks at end;

speaker: Lieutenant
text_entry: And you are darken'd in this action, sir,

speaker: Lieutenant
text_entry: Even by your own.

speaker: AUFIDIUS
text_entry: I cannot help it now,

speaker: AUFIDIUS
text_entry: Unless, by using means, I lame the foot

speaker: AUFIDIUS
text_entry: Of our design. He bears himself more proudlier,

speaker: AUFIDIUS
text_entry: Even to my person, than I thought he would

speaker: AUFIDIUS
text_entry: When first I did embrace him: yet his nature

speaker: AUFIDIUS
text_entry: In that's no changeling; and I must excuse

speaker: AUFIDIUS
text_entry: What cannot be amended.

speaker: Lieutenant
text_entry: Yet I wish, sir,--

speaker: Lieutenant
text_entry: I mean for your particular,--you had not

speaker: Lieutenant
text_entry: Join'd in commission with him; but either

speaker: Lieutenant
text_entry: Had borne the action of yourself, or else

speaker: Lieutenant
text_entry: To him had left it solely.

speaker: AUFIDIUS
text_entry: I understand thee well; and be thou sure,

speaker: AUFIDIUS
text_entry: when he shall come to his account, he knows not

speaker: AUFIDIUS
text_entry: What I can urge against him. Although it seems,

speaker: AUFIDIUS
text_entry: And so he thinks, and is no less apparent

speaker: AUFIDIUS
text_entry: To the vulgar eye, that he bears all things fairly.

speaker: AUFIDIUS
text_entry: And shows good husbandry for the Volscian state,

speaker: AUFIDIUS
text_entry: Fights dragon-like, and does achieve as soon

speaker: AUFIDIUS
text_entry: As draw his sword; yet he hath left undone

speaker: AUFIDIUS
text_entry: That which shall break his neck or hazard mine,

speaker: AUFIDIUS
text_entry: Whene'er we come to our account.

speaker: Lieutenant
text_entry: Sir, I beseech you, think you he'll carry Rome?

speaker: AUFIDIUS
text_entry: All places yield to him ere he sits down;

speaker: AUFIDIUS
text_entry: And the nobility of Rome are his:

speaker: AUFIDIUS
text_entry: The senators and patricians love him too:

speaker: AUFIDIUS
text_entry: The tribunes are no soldiers; and their people

speaker: AUFIDIUS
text_entry: Will be as rash in the repeal, as hasty

speaker: AUFIDIUS
text_entry: To expel him thence. I think he'll be to Rome

speaker: AUFIDIUS
text_entry: As is the osprey to the fish, who takes it

speaker: AUFIDIUS
text_entry: By sovereignty of nature. First he was

speaker: AUFIDIUS
text_entry: A noble servant to them; but he could not

speaker: AUFIDIUS
text_entry: Carry his honours even: whether 'twas pride,

speaker: AUFIDIUS
text_entry: Which out of daily fortune ever taints

speaker: AUFIDIUS
text_entry: The happy man; whether defect of judgment,

speaker: AUFIDIUS
text_entry: To fail in the disposing of those chances

speaker: AUFIDIUS
text_entry: Which he was lord of; or whether nature,

speaker: AUFIDIUS
text_entry: Not to be other than one thing, not moving

speaker: AUFIDIUS
text_entry: From the casque to the cushion, but commanding peace

speaker: AUFIDIUS
text_entry: Even with the same austerity and garb

speaker: AUFIDIUS
text_entry: As he controll'd the war; but one of these--

speaker: AUFIDIUS
text_entry: As he hath spices of them all, not all,

speaker: AUFIDIUS
text_entry: For I dare so far free him--made him fear'd,

speaker: AUFIDIUS
text_entry: So hated, and so banish'd: but he has a merit,

speaker: AUFIDIUS
text_entry: To choke it in the utterance. So our virtues

speaker: AUFIDIUS
text_entry: Lie in the interpretation of the time:

speaker: AUFIDIUS
text_entry: And power, unto itself most commendable,

speaker: AUFIDIUS
text_entry: Hath not a tomb so evident as a chair

speaker: AUFIDIUS
text_entry: To extol what it hath done.

speaker: AUFIDIUS
text_entry: One fire drives out one fire; one nail, one nail;

speaker: AUFIDIUS
text_entry: Rights by rights falter, strengths by strengths do fail.

speaker: AUFIDIUS
text_entry: Come, let's away. When, Caius, Rome is thine,

speaker: AUFIDIUS
text_entry: Thou art poor'st of all; then shortly art thou mine.

speaker: AUFIDIUS
text_entry: Exeunt
